_sText:
Created By: [SG] Bullet Wound
Released: Nov.16/2012
Version: Revamped_V2

Changes:
- Moved/Enlarged Medic
- Changed Bathroom into shower room (it was unused)
- Armoury door now opens for CTs on the outside of it when they get near it
- Made jump pillars easier
- Changed a secret
- Added a watermelon (removed 4 bananas to please the watermelon lord)
- Made soccer glass thinner to make it less bullet proof
- Made soccer field bigger
- Made soccer nets less pathetic
- Made disco songs louder
- Removed Sandcastle
- Add a secret
- Added a trampoline
- Made kitchen entrances wider
- Added trees/benches outside
- Added track outside
- Made Library smaller
- Made main room smaller
